name: David Ramirez
text: Do I send myself back and take the place of my younger self or just appear in the past as a chrono-intruder ?    If it's choice A, sure! I'd take a redo and see what happens. If it's B, enh, that's a bit pointless. I'd have to stay in the past to make use of my future knowledge; if I return to the future, either I annihilate myself because I would have ended up a different person, or it's an alternate universe anyway, in which case I only changed some other universe that might have been different even without my time travel.
